name: Let's Steal Tumbleweed
description:
This is my modd io game jam submission:

moddio-link

Let's steal Tumbleweed

Is a fast past pvp collecting game,

where you have to find tumbleweed on the map and ride it back to your side. to score a team point.

Story

Your parents invited all their children to the yearly tumbleweed race.

But before you have to go to an adventure to the next town to collect enough weed for your siblings.
Be warned! you are not the only one.

Controls

Move: WASD

Mount/Dismount: E
Shoot/Reload: Left-/Right Mouse Button.

Thanks for playing

 --- apsyll ---

known issues

mounting a tumbleweed that is already on your map side won't score fix -> move a little bit towards the middle to reenter the side areas while riding.
